column1: Funeral Services for Douglas will be held on Thursday
column3: 2015 at 10:30 a.m. at St. Olaf Lutheran Church
column4: Devils Lake with Reverend Jeff Nicla officiating.  Visitation will be held at the Gilbertson Funeral Home
column5: Devils Lake on Wednesday from 4:00 p.m. until 7:00 p.m. Visitation on Thursday will be at the church one hour prior to the funeral service.
